question: Hi, first time post.  I live in Kansas City area and am an adult onset Diabetes Type 1 patient.  I currently use a Medtronics insulin pump to manage my diabetes.  I have become increasingly unsatisfied with my current endocrinologist.  I am looking to find a physician in my area who treats Type 1 in adults and also has a good understanding of insulin pumps.  Bottom line:  looking to find someone who really knows the big picture.  Is there a resource that I can use to help narrow down my research.  Thanks for your input and suggestions.
title: Finding Best Physician For Me
